projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Real Estate Project
projects.bodyText:
- A Real Estate web app made using **Django**.
 - The main objective of this application is to help the Real Estate Company to display unlimited number of property listings on the website.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: Flipbook App
projects.bodyText: - Flipbooks are a great way to show and share such PDF publications as ebooks, catalogs, brochures, magazines, proposals, reports, newsletters, photo albums, etc.

projects.title: Student Database Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Student Information Management System provides a simple interface for maintenance of student information.
 - It can be used by educational institutes or colleges to maintain the records of students easily.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- I made my first project in HTML, CSS & JavaScript.
 - My personal Portfolio which displays all **my work experience**.

projects.title: Simple Python Programs
projects.bodyText:
- Basic Programs.
 - Basic concepts of Python program like loops, functions, native datatypes and so on.

projects.title: e-commerce
projects.bodyText:
- Ecommerce stands for electronic commerce and refers to a digital platform and a business model where you can buy or sell products online.
 - Ecommerce operates in four market segments, including business-to-business, business-to-consumer, consumer-to-consumer, and consumer-to-business.
